mapper.insert: insert into ykt_user (id, username, password, email, phone, question, answer, role, image, code, create_time, update_time, is_alive) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{question,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{role,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isAlive,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update ykt_user set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, question = #{question,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, answer = #{answer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role = #{role,jdbcType=INTEGER}, image = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_alive = #{isAlive,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, username, password, email, phone, question, answer, role, image, code, create_time, update_time, is_alive from ykt_user where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
